mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_location INNER JOIN tb_fire_ex ON tb_location.location_id = tb_fire_ex.location_id;
SELECT * FROM tb_module INNER JOIN tb_location ON tb_module.location_id = tb_location.location_id WHERE module_id = #{value};

select* from tb_event event inner join tb_module module on event.module_id = module.module_id inner join tb_location location on module.location_id = location.location_id order by event_id DESC limit ${value};
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_module module, tb_location location where module.location_id = location.location_id and module.type = 'arduino' and location LIKE CONCAT(${value},'%');
